radiographic_examinations.findings: Best corrected visual acuity was 20/80 in the right eye (OD) and 20/400 in the left eye (OS).
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressive visual loss for 6 months prior to presentation.

radiographic_examinations.findings: IOP was 38 mm Hg in the right eye (OD) and 32 mm Hg in the left eye (OS).
